unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad is key for us. We plan to visit starting 10/10/2024. Offering competitive packages, around Rs. 15 Lakhs, is crucial. Last year's hires from BITS Pilani have been excellent. Looking to improve on the 85% offer acceptance rate. Interviews scheduled for 14/10/2024 at 11:00 hrs. Hope to find future leaders like Ms. Sharma. This year we are targeting more female candidates. Deadline for applications is 20/09/2024.
normalised: Campus hiring at I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad is key for us. We plan to visit starting tenth october two thousand and twenty four. Offering competitive packages, around rupee fifteen lakhs, is crucial. Last year's hires from B I T S Pilani have been excellent. Looking to improve on the eighty five percent offer acceptance rate. Interviews scheduled for fourteenth october two thousand and twenty four at eleven zero zero hours. Hope to find future leaders like Missus Sharma. This year we are targeting more female candidates. Deadline for applications is twentieth september two thousand and twenty four.
